metadata.title: CVE-2022-2119 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: OFFIS DCMTK's (All versions prior to 3.6.7) service class provider (SCP) is vulnerable to path traversal, allowing an attacker to write DICOM files into arbitrary directories under controlled names. This could allow remote code execution.

criterions.comment: dcmtk package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
